title: Seductive Shadows
description: When sensually-inspired art student, Charlie Williams, is sought out for erotic pleasure and fantasy, she jumps at the chance to escape her haunted and agonizing past—not realizing that she just secured an even more terrifying future. Led into a world of danger and betrayal, she finds secrets she was never meant to uncover. One of those secrets is Cameron Hardy. He could be the answer she’s always been looking for, or her final mistake.The deal offers security.The money promises financial freedom.But is it too good to be true?
author: Marni Mann
